price: Tí A bá fẹ́ ni, Àwa ìbá sọ ọ́ di gbígbẹ, ẹ̀yin yó sì máa ṣèèmọ̀ (tí ẹ óò máa ká àbámọ̀).
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
